definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Kant was the first definitely to signalize the distinction between Reason and Understanding.
sentences.chinese: 康德最早明確提出知性和理性的區別。

sentences.english: Kant and Rawls think Patrick has a point.
sentences.chinese: 康德和羅爾斯認爲帕特里克有一個觀點。

sentences.english: This second version appears to be less vulnerable to Kantian criticisms than the first.
sentences.chinese: 這第二個版本比第一對康德的批評顯得是更少脆弱。

sentences.english: Kants thought of freedom comes from that of Rousseaus, but also alienates it.
sentences.chinese: 康德的自由思想源於盧梭，卻又不同於盧梭。

sentences.english: Maybe related to Key lime. I didn’t know what the Kantian sublime was.
sentences.chinese: 我那時還真不知道康德式的盲目到底是個什麼東西。

sentences.english: Kant: Excerpts from Metaphysics of Morals.
sentences.chinese: 節錄自康德《道德形上學》。

sentences.english: Kant and Hegel have developed idealism.
sentences.chinese: 康德和黑格爾發展了唯心主義。

sentences.english: This offer is only available at Wan Chai clinic of CCMC.
sentences.chinese: 此優惠只適用於康德堂灣仔診所。

sentences.english: Kant identify with this view deeply, but he believes teleology finally.
sentences.chinese: 康德深以這一觀點爲是，但他最終相信目的論。

sentences.english: However, Edmund Burke and Kant provided classic studies of the difference between beauty and the sublime.
sentences.chinese: 然而，伯克與康德作出了美與昇華的古典研究。

sentences.english: The two ancient positions will be represented by Plato and Aristotle, the two modern positions by Immanuel Kant and John Stuart Mill.
sentences.chinese: 前者是柏拉圖和亞里斯多德，後者是康德與約翰彌爾。

sentences.english: Noumena is an important concept in Kants Critique of Pure Reason.
sentences.chinese: 本體是康德《純粹理性批判》中的一個重要概念。

sentences.english: In therms of humanity, Kant maintains the theory of human nature based on rational equality.
sentences.chinese: 在人性問題上，康德首先主張基於理性平等的人性論。

sentences.english: But there is also more to be said about Kant's focus on the absolutism-relationalism debate.
sentences.chinese: 但也有更多可說的約康德的絕對重點，關係論的辯論。

sentences.english: I didn’t know what the Kantian sublime was.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道康德之崇高指的是什麼。

sentences.english: Kant developed the research on theory of knowledge into higher stage.
sentences.chinese: 而康德把知識論的探究推進到了更高的層次。

definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
Baruch or Benedict Spinoza (1632-1677), rationalist philosopher
René Descartes (1596-1650), French philosopher and author of Discours de la méthode 方法論|方法论
